entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 01 January 2023
